org.freezedry.persistence.builders

Interface NodeBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Copyable<NodeBuilder>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLeafNodeBuilder, AbstractNodeBuilder, AbstractPrimitiveLeafNodeBuilder, ArrayNodeBuilder, BooleanNodeBuilder, ByteNodeBuilder, CharacterNodeBuilder, CollectionNodeBuilder, DateNodeBuilder, DoubleNodeBuilder, FloatNodeBuilder, IntegerNodeBuilder, LongNodeBuilder, MapNodeBuilder, ShortNodeBuilder, StringNodeBuilder

    public interface NodeBuilder
extends Copyable<NodeBuilder>
    Interface for the classes used to generate InfoNodes. These NodeBuilders are used by the PersistenceEngine to create InfoNode from Object and vice-versa. These NodeBuilders must fit in with the recursive method used by the PersistenceEngine.createNode(Class, Object, String) method.
    See Also:
    AbstractNodeBuilder

        getCopy

    • Method Detail

      • createInfoNode

        InfoNode createInfoNode(java.lang.Class<?> containingClass,
                      java.lang.Object object,
                      java.lang.String fieldName)
                        throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Generates an InfoNode from the specified Object. The specified containing Class is the Class in which the specified field name lives. And the object is the value of the field name.
        Parameters:
        containingClass - The Class that contains the specified field name
        object - The value of the field with the specified field name
        fieldName - The name of the field for which the object is the value
        Returns:
        The constructed InfoNode based on the specified information
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException

      • createInfoNode

        InfoNode createInfoNode(java.lang.Object object,
                      java.lang.String persistName)
                        throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Generates an InfoNode from the specified Object. This method is used for objects that have an overriding node builder and are not contained within a class. For example, suppose you would like to persist an ArrayList for serialization and would like to maintain the type information.
        Parameters:
        object - The value of the field with the specified field name
        Returns:
        The constructed InfoNode based on the specified information
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException

      • createObject

        java.lang.Object createObject(java.lang.Class<?> containingClass,
                            java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                            InfoNode node)
                              throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Creates an object of the specified Class based on the information in the InfoNode. Note that the MidiDevice.Info may also contain type information about the class to generate. The specified Class overrides that value. This is done to avoid modifying the MidiDevice.Info tree when supplemental information becomes available.
        Parameters:
        containingClass - The Class containing the clazz, represented by the InfoNode
        clazz - The Class of the object to create
        node - The information about the object to create
        Returns:
        The object constructed based on the info node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException

      • createObject

        java.lang.Object createObject(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                            InfoNode node)
                              throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Creates an object of the specified Class based on the information in the InfoNode. This method is used for objects that have an overriding node builder and are not contained within a class. For example, suppose you would like to persist an ArrayList for serialization and would like to maintain the type information.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class of the object to create
        node - The information about the object to create
        Returns:
        The object constructed based on the info node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException

      • setPersistenceEngine

        void setPersistenceEngine(PersistenceEngine engine)
        Sets the PersistenceEngine with which this NodeBuilder must work. Recall, that the createInfoNode(Class, Object, String) methods is called from within an recursive algorithm managed by the PersistenceEngine.createNode(Class, Object, String) method. The reference to the PersistenceEngine is used to call be to that method for creating non-leaf nodes (this essentially allows the recursion to continue).
        Parameters:
        engine - The PersistenceEngine used to create the DOM model from the object
